name: maxdb_fetch_field
purpose: Returns the next field in the result set

return.description:
Returns an resource which contains field definition information or FALSE if no field information
   is available.Object properties
   
    
     
      Property
      Description
     
    
    
     
      name
      The name of the column
     
     
      max_length
      The maximum width of the field for the result set.
     
     
      type
      The data type used for this field
     
     
      decimals
      The number of decimals used (for integer fields)
